sentence.text: Their phosphorylation activity has also linked them to the development of neurodegenerative diseases like Alzheimer's disease, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis or spinocerebellar ataxia type 11.

The final analysis of all this information led us to propose TTBK1 as a new target for the treatment of neurodegenerative diseases and its selective inhibitors as potential effective drugs for the treatment of these severe unmet disorders
